scripts.prod: npm run clean && hugo server -e production --minify --gc --renderToDisk --disableFastRender --enableGitInfo -b http://localhost:7080 -p 7080
scripts.docker-prod: docker run -v $PWD:/src -p 7080:7080 -p 7081:7081 -p 7082:7082 hugomods/hugo:exts hugo server --bind 0.0.0.0 -e production --minify --gc --renderToDisk --disableFastRender --enableGitInfo -b http://localhost:7080 -p 7080
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.update: hugo mod get -u && hugo mod tidy
